title: Discover Berlin with a Stylish City Stay
description: Experience the history, culture and gourmet delights of one of the world’s most popular cities with a historic stay at ABION Villa, perched on the edge of the River Spree, located a stone’s throw from the famous Tiergarten - home to the Berlin Zoo. Enjoy a three, five or seven-night stay with daily buffet breakfast, welcome bottle of prosecco and a glass of prosecco on arrival.

title: Ultra-Stylish City Stay in Berlin’s Most Central Neighbourhood
description: Discover the rich history, vibrant culture, fabulous food and architectural gems of one of the world’s most loved destinations, Berlin. Experience all that the city has on offer from Hotel Berlin Mitte Managed by Meliá - an ultra-stylish launchpad located in the vibrant Mitte district, the city's first and most central neighbourhood. Your escape in Germany’s capital city includes daily international buffet breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival and complimentary mini bar. Plus enjoy an automatic upgrade to a Premium Room, featuring even more space and luxe amenities.
location_description: Hotel Berlin Mitte managed by Meliá - 2019

title: Award-Winning High-End Historic Berlin Mansion Stay by Patrick Hellmann w. Daily Breakfast
description: Welcome to Schlosshotel Berlin by Patrick Hellmann - taking boutique luxury to another calibre, crowned Germany's Leading Boutique Hotel 2023 by the World Travel Awards. Discover the addictive pulse of Berlin in a stunning mansion-turned-hotel, offering a refined sanctuary from the hustle of the city. Originally built in 1914 and renovated in 2014 by fashion designer Patrick Hellmann with unique designs by Karl Lagerfeld, this is a fashion-forward escape not to be missed. Splashed in artistic graffiti and brimming with history, Berlin is one of those cities where every turn offers up a cool piece of artwork, a quirky cafe or a monument that tells a thousand stories. Experience it all, while merging old-world glamour with contemporary style.

title: Stylish City Escape at H10 Berlin Ku’damm
description: Experience the history, culture and gourmet delights of one of the world’s most popular cities with an award-winning stay at H10 Berlin Ku’damm, located moments from the city’s main shopping and dining street. Includes daily breakfast and a cocktail each - Executive Lounge upgrades also available.

title: Stylish City Escape in the Heart of Berlin
description: Experience the history, culture and gourmet delights of one of the world’s most popular cities with an award-winning stay at H10 Berlin Ku’damm, located moments from the city’s main shopping and dining street. Arrive to a welcome drink and enjoy a delicious daily breakfast, and a tapas lunch at the hotel's Salt & Pepper restaurant.

title: High-End Historic Mansion Stay by Fashion and Design Royalty Patrick Hellmann & Karl Lagerfeld
description: Welcome to Patrick Hellmann Schlosshotel - taking boutique luxury to another calibre. Discover the addictive pulse of Berlin in a fashion-forward, 1900s-mansion-turned-hotel owned by renowned Berliner, designer Patrick Hellmann with unique designs by iconic Chanel designer Karl Lagerfeld. Includes daily buffet breakfast, two-course seasonal lunch, daily replenished in-room refreshments, daily access to the SPA and all its high-end facilities and a guaranteed late 2pm checkout.

title: Heritage Berlin Escape near Iconic Kurfürstendamm with Daily Breakfast
description: From the Brandenburg Gate to the East Side Gallery, soak up the sights of Berlin from the stylish H10 Berlin Ku'damm. Housed in a historic former school building with a glorious heritage facade, this elegant hotel sits just moments from the famed Kurfürstendamm - the city's premier shopping and dining boulevard where new and old collide. After days exploring the streets of Berlin, retreat to your central launchpad where outstanding service awaits. Refuel at the sumptuous Salt & Pepper restaurant for breakfast or head to the incredible Steps Bar, which showcases a fusion of German and Mediterranean dishes. When it's time to pamper yourself, the indulgent Despacio Spa Centre awaits.

title: Stylish City Escape in the Heart of Vibrant Berlin
description: The bright lights, rich culture and architectural gems of Berlin await during a stay at the stylish INNSiDE by Meliá Berlin Mitte, ideally located steps from the city’s most iconic sights. Enjoy the full celebrity treatment with an automatic upgrade to a larger INNSiDE Room Extra Space, daily breakfast, a welcome drink and complimentary in-room minibar with soft drinks and snacks.

title: Heritage Berlin Stay Perfectly Located near Kurfürstendamm with Daily Breakfast
description: From the Brandenburg Gate to the East Side Gallery, soak up the sights of Berlin from the stylish H10 Berlin Ku'damm. Housed in a historic former school building with a glorious heritage facade, this elegant hotel sits just moments from the famed Kurfürstendamm - the city's premier shopping and dining boulevard where new and old collide. After days exploring the streets of Berlin, retreat to your central launchpad where outstanding service awaits. Refuel at the sumptuous Salt & Pepper Restaurant for breakfast, or head to the incredible Steps Bar, which showcases a fusion of German and Mediterranean dishes. When it's time to pamper yourself, the indulgent Despacio Spa Centre awaits.

title: Illustrious Berlin Oasis on Famous Kurfürstendamm Boulevard with Daily Breakfast
description: Glimpse the grandeur of Berlin's golden age with a stay at Hotel Bristol Berlin, an enchanting favourite of travelling superstars and politicians for over seven decades. Tuck into gourmet breakfast at Belle Etage and sip expertly crafted cocktails while indulging in delicious fare at the Bristol Lounge & Eatery. Adventure to the magic of the nearby Charlottenburg Palace and exciting Berlin Zoo, or spend a day shopping the city's famed Kurfürstendamm boulevard before returning to your elegantly adorned room.

title: Experience VIP Club Access in the Heart of Vibrant Berlin
description: The bright lights, rich culture and architectural gems of Berlin await. Discover all this sprawling metropolis has on offer from a glamorous launchpad, the stylish Meliá Berlin, ideally located steps away from the city’s most iconic sights. Enjoy the full celebrity treatment with exclusive access to The Level Lounge, with daily breakfast, nightly drinks and snacks, exclusive check-in and check-out and so much more.

title: Five-Star Award-Winning Old-World Opulence in the Heart of Berlin
description: Explore one of Europe’s most exciting and dynamic cities from the comfort of the grand Regent Berlin, an IHG Hotel, perfectly perched in the city's beating heart. Decorated with a plethora of awards, this stunning hotel’s unassuming frontage gives way to glittering chandeliers, culinary masterpieces and a serene health club. What's just outside is just as alluring - this comfortable and convenient escape is just minutes from the famous Brandenburg Gate, Museum Island and more.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Berlin City Centre
title: Berlin City Centre Break with Lobby Bar & Outdoor Terrace
description: Discover the best of Germany's capital at Holiday Inn Express Berlin City Centre, an IHG Hotel, which boasts an unbeatable location just a 15-minute stroll from Potsdamer Platz, Checkpoint Charlie and sections of the Berlin Wall. When you're not exploring the city sights, stay in and enjoy some sunshine on the outdoor terrace, sip a German beer or riesling from the Lobby Bar, or kickstart each morning with a mouthwatering breakfast buffet served from the Great Room dining area.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Berlin City Centre, an IHG Hotel

title: Glamorous Five-Star Berlin Boutique Break with City-View Rooftop Bar
description:
Be immersed in the glamour and grunge of Germany's capital at the fashion-forward Hotel Zoo Berlin. You can expect cutting-edge, contemporary design that doesn't compromise the traditional Weimar-era elements from the original 1911 building. Dine in the hotel’s romantic restaurant, decked out with chandeliers and lit by the soft glow of candlelight. Grace Bar is the perfect place to sip a cocktail before heading out to explore the wild streets of Berlin. Meanwhile, the stylish rooftop terrace offers sweeping city views, while the winter garden tempts you to stay cosy in front of its five-metre-long fireplace.

When you do tear yourself away from Hotel Zoo Berlin, meander along the famous Kurfürstendamm avenue with its trendy shops, hotels and restaurants, all right on your doorstep. With an unrivalled location and jaw-dropping aesthetic, there’s something for everyone; from foodies to shopaholics and culture vultures.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions:**

- Wake up to **one continental breakfast** at Grace Restaurant
- Stay connected with **complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi**
- Long city nights call for lazy **late checkout** (for stays of 5+ nights, subject to availability)
- Additional **continental breakfasts** at Grace Restaurant (one per night, for stays 2-5 nights) 

**King Suite Upgrade**: A freestanding bathtub, plush leather lounge area and generous panoramic windows make the King Suite your luxe home-away-from-home.

title: Stylish Stay in the Heart of Berlin with Welcome Drinks
description:
Experience the history, culture and gourmet delights of one of the world’s most popular cities with an award-winning stay at H10 Berlin Ku’damm, located moments from the city’s main shopping and dining street. Splashed in artistic graffiti and brimming with history, Berlin is a city where every turn offers up a cool piece of artwork, a quirky café or a monument that tells a thousand stories. Discover it all staying at H10 Berlin Ku’damm, located just a stone's throw from Kurfürstendamm avenue, western Berlin's main shopping street, and within 10 minutes' walk of Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and Berlin Zoo.

Designed by the renowned German studio kleihues+kleihues and transformed from a historic university (with 150-year-old features still intact), H10 Berlin Ku’damm offers a clever mix of modern luxury and heritage charm. Onsite facilities include Salt & Pepper restaurant, Steps Bar and an outdoor terrace that invites balmy summer dining. You'll also find the Despacio Spa with relaxing treatments, sauna and steam bath, a gym and free Wi-Fi. Proud owner of a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 award, H10 Berlin Ku’damm is ready to welcome you to Germany's unforgettable capital.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Berlin - City East Side
title: Hip East Berlin City Break with All-Day Bar & Gym
description: Adventure through Germany’s vibrant capital during a stay at the uber-stylish Holiday Inn Berlin - City East Side, an IHG Hotel. Located next to Mercedes-Benz Arena, home to some of the biggest concerts and events alongside exciting dining options, you don’t have to go far to enjoy the best attractions and nightlife on offer. With a relaxed lobby restaurant and bar area, you don’t even need to leave the front doors to chill out and enjoy a cocktail or coffee, any time of the day.
location_description: Holiday Inn Berlin - City East Side, an IHG Hotel

title: Boutique Escape in Berlin's Arts & Culture Quarter
description:
Feel inspired by Berlin's artistic culture and eclectic style with a boutique stay at Sir Savigny, a cosy oasis set in the heart of the city. Housed in heritage architecture in the bohemian Charlottenburg district, this urban escape, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, effortlessly captures the energy of artists past and present through its clean design and communal spaces. 

Stretch out in sophisticated rooms featuring carefully curated minibars and avant-garde artwork, hang around for the latest exhibition in The Lounge, or retreat to The Library, where you're invited to get lost in a good book, sip a cup of tea or mingle with new friends. Step out onto the pulsing streets and be welcomed by a creative neighbourhood that inspires open minds; wander along Kantstrasse and discover pre-war architecture and cafés once frequented by influential thinkers and artists, or ponder the past while strolling the landscaped gardens and baroque interiors of Charlottenburg Palace, a short 10-minute drive away.

title: Trendy Berlin Retreat in the Heart of the City with Onsite Restaurant
description: Discover the mesmerising combination of sophistication and stylish grunge specific to Germany’s capital city with a luxurious stay at Crowne Plaza Berlin - Potsdamer Platz, an IHG Hotel. Bursting with vanguard architecture, fabulous nightlife and rich history, Berlin is sprinkled with an abundance of trendsetting fashion boutiques and cafes. Live like the locals by exploring during the day, then return to the hotel and enjoy mouthwatering dishes at Layla restaurant by Meir Adoni at night.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Berlin - Potsdamer Platz, an IHG Hotel

title: Designer Berlin Escape in Charming Residential Quarter
description:
See Berlin through a local lens with a designer stay at Max Brown Ku'Damm, a trendy oasis flaunting an affluent residential address in the heart of the city. Step through the front doors and inhale the welcoming scent of fluffy pancakes from the in-house bakery before making your way to your stylish room complete with luxe interiors that echo the laid-back vibe of the surrounding neighbourhood. When you're not spinning tunes on your Crosley record player or sinking into Max Brown's heavenly signature bed, step out onto the charming streets and discover a wealth of local gems.

Splash your cash on boutique fashion at BIKINI BERLIN, Germany's first concept mall, treat your tastebuds to a delicious cheese and wine pairing at the iconic Paris Bar, or spend an afternoon admiring the historic architecture nearby, including Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church.
offer_address: Max Brown Ku'damm Uhlandstraße 49, Berlin 10719, Germany

title: Boutique West Berlin Escape Minutes from Kurfurstendamm Shopping Street
description: In the heart of West Berlin, Hotel Indigo Berlin - Ku'Damm, an IHG Hotel, is a serene urban escape from the traffic and crowds of the city. Awaken refreshed in an artistic guestroom boasting a bright, modern style before starting your day with breakfast at the onsite restaurant or revitalising your body at the fitness centre. As evening approaches, savour a refined drink from the extensive drink menu at the bar or explore bold and beautiful Berlin and its dynamic nightlife at nearby restaurants and bars.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Berlin - Ku'Damm, an IHG Hotel

title: Trendy West Berlin Escape with Fine Dining Restaurant, Lobby Bar & Pool
description: Stylish, modern and set right in the heart of Berlin West, indulge in a superb stay at the Holiday Inn Berlin - City West, an IHG Hotel. Take advantage of the hotel’s central location, close by to a variety of Charlottenburg’s most exciting sites and the city centre. Then unwind with a swim in the indoor pool or loosen up in the sauna. Sip your drink of choice in the plush Intermezzo bar or treat your tastebuds to gourmet fare while dining at the onsite Il Faggio restaurant's breezy terrace.
location_description: Holiday Inn Berlin - City West, an IHG Hotel

title: Berlin Ultra-Cool Escape with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: The buzzing metropolis of Berlin is yours to discover from the stylish and upscale InterContinental Berlin, an IHG Hotel. With an ideal location next to the leafy green expanse of the Tiergarten, you can enjoy a garden reprieve from the bustle of the city. When you're not out there exploring, make use of the indoor heated swimming pool, sip handcrafted cocktails at Marlene Bar and be wined and dined at Hugo's Restaurant, a Michelin-starred kitchen.

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre Ku'Damm
title: West Berlin Escape Minutes from Kurfurstendamm Shopping Street
description: Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre Ku'Damm towers over the heart of West Berlin, offering a serene escape from the resonating pulse of the city. Satisfy your appetite with breakfast at Wilson's restaurant before invigorating your body and mind at the fitness centre, or adventure into this captivating city to experience bold Berlin. As the evening approaches, find relaxation with a soothing treatment at the spa, retreat to a stylish room or suite or savour a refined drink at Kemmons Bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre Ku'damm, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo Berlin - East Side Gallery
title: Trendy Berlin Escape by East Side Gallery with Rooftop Bar
description: Discover the grit and glamour of Germany’s capital city with a luxurious stay at Hotel Indigo Berlin - East Side Gallery, an IHG Hotel. Whether you're here to discover the city's vibrant arts scene, sample its unique party culture or immerse yourself in the history imprinted on its streets, this centrally located retreat makes the perfect base. Fuel up for a night out with a meal at the Gallery Restaurant, or relax with a sundowner paired with city views at the Gallery Rooftop Bar after a long day of exploring.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Berlin - East Side Gallery, an IHG Hotel

title: Regal Kempinski Berlin Escape with Iconic Brandenburg Gate Views, Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Two-Story Spa
description: Experience the grandeur of the five-star Hotel Adlon Kempinski Berlin, a symphony of luxury and elegance in the heart of the beautiful city. This regal hotel is nestled beside the historic Brandenburg Gate and offers a gateway to the city's vibrant culture and history. Indulge in two Michelin-starred dining at Lorenz Adlon Esszimmer, sip on expertly crafted cocktails at the stylish Lobby Bar, or unwind in the opulent Adlon Spa by Resense, expanding two floors of the grand hotel.
